title: Preparations for the Temple
summary: Solomon prepares to build the temple. He makes a treaty with King Hiram of Tyre to acquire cedar wood and skilled workers. Labor is organized, and materials begin arriving for the temple construction.

faq.question: Who helped supply materials for the temple?
faq.answer: King Hiram of Tyre provided cedar wood and craftsmen.

faq.question: What did Solomon do to prepare the workforce?
faq.answer: He conscripted laborers and divided them into shifts to work in Lebanon.
